brandStory.title: Our Story
paragraphs: Coliseum Skate was founded with a simple mission: to document and preserve the rich culture of skateboarding for future generations.
Through our documentaries, photography, and publications, we capture the authentic spirit of skateboarding - the creativity, the community, and the passion that drives skaters worldwide.

founder.name: John Tracy
founder.title: Founder & Creative Director
founder.bio: John Tracy has been documenting skateboarding culture for over two decades. His work has been featured in major publications and film festivals around the world.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To document, preserve, and celebrate skateboarding culture through compelling visual storytelling that inspires and educates.

values.title: Authenticity
values.description: We capture skateboarding culture as it truly is, without filters or pretense

values.title: Community
values.description: We believe in the power of skateboarding to bring people together

values.title: Creativity
values.description: We celebrate the artistic expression that defines skateboarding

values.title: Legacy
values.description: We preserve skateboarding history for future generations
